info.title: Financial Document Analyzer API
info.description: FastAPI application with JWT auth, document management, and CrewAI agents

post.description: Login user and return JWT tokens
Refresh access token using refresh token
Logout user and revoke all sessions

schema.title: Response Get All Users Auth Users Get

get.description: List documents for the current user with optional search

delete.description: Delete a document by document ID

post.description: Comprehensive financial document analysis - runs in background
Verify if the document is a valid financial record

get.description: List analysis reports for the current user with optional filtering and pagination

delete.description: Admin endpoint to delete any analysis report
